full_text: Berroco yarns for this pattern have been discontinued. Directions are still available. Monty is a super simple mouse toy made from a square of plain knitting. Stuff it with catnip for a great cat toy or polyester fiber fill for a kid’s stocking stuffer. (Berroco) MATERIALS For A – BERROCO KELTIC (50 grs), 1 Ball #5863 Galloway For B – BERROCO CHINCHILLA (50 grs), 1 Ball #5520 Persimmon For C - BERROCO FOLIAGE (50 grs), 1 Ball #5989 Walnut Small amount of BERROCO ULTRA ALPACA (100 grs) or scrap yarn in contrasting shade for ears, nose, tail and eyes. Straight knitting needles, size 9 Crochet hook, size 5.00 mm (H) Small amount contrasting yarn for ears, nose, tail and eyes Small amount polyfil Tapestry needle Warning: If Monty is made for your cat, we would suggest eliminating the yarn tail since it could potentially be ingested. Assembly diagram is provided.
name: Ravelry: Monty pattern by Berroco Design Team
